message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm happy to offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and you won't find this quality anywhere else.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I can only pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $95 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $100. It's a fair price considering the value of the product.
